description: Sublattices of index n in generic 5-dimensional lattice.
references: M. Baake, "Solution of coincidence problem...", in R. V. Moody, ed., Math. of Long-Range Aperiodic Order, Kluwer 1997, pp. 9-44.
links: Index entries for sequences related to sublattices
formula: f(Q, n) = Sum d*f(Q-1, d), d|n; here Q=5.Multiplicative with a(p^e) = product (p^(e+k)-1)/(p^k-1), k=1..4Dirichlet g.f. zeta(s)*zeta(s-1)*zeta(s-2)*zeta(s-3)*zeta(s-4). Dirichlet convolution of A038991 with A000583. - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 31 2011
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, #*DivisorSum[#, #*DivisorSum[#, #*DivisorSum[#, # &] &] &] &]; Array[a, 50] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 02 2015, after _Joerg Arndt_ *)
prog: (PARI) a(n)=sumdiv(n,x, x * sumdiv(x,y, y * sumdiv(y,z, z * sumdiv(z,w, w ) ) ) ); /* _Joerg Arndt_, Oct 07 2012 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Offset changed from 0 to 1 by _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 31 2011
